mapper.select: select count(enorder.entrust_type) as totalCount, enorder.entrust_type as status from ope_entrust_order enorder group by status

select count(1) from ope_entrust_order enorder left join ope_sys_staff consignee on consignee.id = enorder.consignee_user and consignee.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff createBy on createBy.id = enorder.created_by and createBy.dr = 0

select enorder.id as id, enorder.invoice_id as invoiceId, enorder.invoice_no as invoiceNo, enorder.entrust_no as consignOrderNo, enorder.entrust_status as status, enorder.consignor_qty as qty, enorder.delivery_date as deliveryDate, enorder.consignee_user as consigneeId, consignee.first_name as createByFirstName, consignee.last_name as consigneeLastName, enorder.consignee_country_code as consigneeCountryCode, enorder.consignee_user_telephone as consigneeTelephone, enorder.consignee_user_mail as consigneeMail, enorder.created_by as createById, createBy.first_name as createByFirstName, createBy.last_name as createByLastName, enorder.created_time as createByDate from ope_entrust_order enorder left join ope_sys_staff consignee on consignee.id = enorder.consignee_user and consignee.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff createBy on createBy.id = enorder.created_by and createBy.dr = 0
order by enorder.created_time desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}

select id as id, entrust_no as consignOrderNo, entrust_status as status, delivery_date as deliveryDate, trans_type as transportType, consignee_user as consigneeUserId, consignee_country_code as consigneeUserCountryCode, consignee_user_telephone as consigneeUserTelephone, consignee_user_mail as consigneeUserMail, consignor_user as consignorUserId, consignor_country_code as consignorUserCountryCode, consignor_telephone as consignorUserTelephone, consignor_mail as consignorUserMail, notify_user as notifyUserId, notify_user_name as notifyUserName, notify_country_code as notifyUserCountryCode, notify_user_telephone as notifyUserTelephone, notify_user_mail as notifyUserMail, enorder.consignee_post_code as zipcodeName, enorder.consignee_address as address from ope_entrust_order enorder left join ope_sys_staff consignee on consignee.id = enorder.consignee_user and consignee.dr = 0 left join ope_sys_staff consignor on consignor.id = enorder.consignor_user and consignor.dr = 0 where enorder.dr = 0 and enorder.id=#{id}
